title: Share of economic sectors in the GDP in Croatia 2018
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 3 lines denoting Agriculture, Industry, and Services. The y axis indicates the Share in GDP and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Industry is gradually decreasing, Agriculture, and Services are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Services, 2. Industry, and lastly, 3. Agriculture.
Overall across the Year, Services mostly maintained the highest Share in GDP when compared to others with a mean value of 58.59, and it peaked at 2011.
After Services, Industry overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 21.8, peaking at 2008.
The botommost line, Agriculture,  has a mean of 3.38, and peaked at 2009.

Overall across the Year, Services mostly maintained the highest Share in GDP when compared to others with a mean value of 58.59, and it peaked at 2011.
